project: Global Repository â€” CI/CD, README & Contributing Guide
description: Makes the repository production-ready for open collaboration by adding GitHub Actions workflows for continuous integration and deployment, completely rewriting the README with full project documentation, and adding a CONTRIBUTING.md that welcomes both external contributors and guides internal team members.

stories.title: Add Python linting configuration
stories.description: As a developer, I want a Python linter configured so that CI can enforce code style consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: ruff added to [project.optional-dependencies] dev extras in pyproject.toml
[tool.ruff] section added to pyproject.toml with line-length = 88 and select = ['E', 'F', 'W']
ruff check bot/ passes cleanly on the existing codebase (fix any violations found)
ruff check bot/ script documented in README dev-setup section
Typecheck passes

stories.title: Create PR validation CI workflow
stories.description: As a maintainer, I want every PR to develop to automatically run the full test suite and linters so that broken code cannot be merged.
acceptanceCriteria: File created at .github/workflows/ci.yml
Workflow triggers on pull_request targeting develop
Workflow has two parallel jobs: test-bot and lint-dashboard
test-bot job runs Python 3.11, installs dev deps, runs pytest and ruff
lint-dashboard job runs Node.js 20, runs npm ci and npm run typecheck in dashboard/
Typecheck passes

stories.title: Create develop branch push CI/CD workflow
stories.description: As a developer, I want the dev environment to automatically update when code is merged into develop so the team always has a working preview of the latest changes.
acceptanceCriteria: File created at .github/workflows/deploy-dev.yml
Workflow triggers on push to develop
Workflow runs CI checks before deploying
Deploy step uses SSH with GitHub Actions secrets
Deploy step runs: docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --build
GitHub Environment named development is referenced
Typecheck passes

stories.title: Create main branch production CD workflow
stories.description: As a maintainer, I want production to automatically deploy when main is updated so that stable releases reach users without manual steps.
acceptanceCriteria: File created at .github/workflows/deploy-prod.yml
Workflow triggers on push to main
Workflow runs CI checks before deploying
Deploy step uses separate PROD_* GitHub Actions secrets
GitHub Environment named production is referenced
Typecheck passes

stories.title: Complete README rewrite
stories.description: As a new contributor or user, I want a comprehensive README so I can understand the project, set it up locally, and know how to contribute without asking for help.
acceptanceCriteria: README includes all sections listed in Functional Requirements FR-5
Architecture diagram shows bot <-> API <-> dashboard <-> Discord relationship
All CI/CD badge links are correct and point to workflow files
Local dev setup instructions are accurate and complete
API reference table covers all 15 routes
Screenshots section includes placeholder text
No broken links
Typecheck passes

stories.title: Create CONTRIBUTING.md
stories.description: As an external contributor or internal team member, I want clear contribution guidelines so I know the workflow, standards, and how to get my changes accepted.
acceptanceCriteria: File created at /workspace/CONTRIBUTING.md
Covers all sections listed in Functional Requirements FR-6
Branch naming convention examples are concrete
PR checklist is included as a copyable Markdown checklist
Internal team notes section explains the develop -> main promotion process
Secret/environment variable setup instructions reference deploy secrets
Typecheck passes
